titleStmt.title: Seven sermons preach'd upon several occasions to which is added, The golden rule, or, The royal law of equity explained / by John Goodman ...
titleStmt.author: Goodman, John, 1625 or 6-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Clavel ... and Luke Meredith ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
